awards.text: Nominated for 2 Golden Globes. Another 2 wins & 10 nominations.

fullplot: An inksetter in New York, Quoyle returns to his family's longtime home, a small fishing town in Newfoundland, with his young daughter, after a traumatizing experience with her mother, Petal, who sold her to an illegal adoption agency. Though Quoyle has had little success thus far in life, his shipping news column in the newspaper "The Gammy Bird" finds an audience, and his experiences in the town change his life. Then he meets the widow Wavey...
plot: An emotionally-beaten man with his young daughter moves to his ancestral home in Newfoundland to reclaim his life.
title: The Shipping News

tomatoes.consensus: Though solidly made and acted, The Shipping News is rather heavy-handed and dull, especially given the nature of its protagonist.

writers: Annie Proulx (based on the novel by)
